Hi,Thanks for writing in.Your symptoms are due to the regular migraines that you are having. It is important to break the cycle of migraines. What medications are you currently taking and have you been able to identify a trigger?Medications like Topamax help to break the migraine cycle. Magnesium supplements also play a preventive role. Complete avoidance of trigger is another treatment. I would also suggest you take B12 supplements also as you may be suffering from peripheral neuropathy.Take care!
I have taken Excedrin it helps for about an hour, but I have never taken Topamax.What is peripheral neuropathy?
I have an MRI scheduled, but it wont be for another couple weeks, Thank you!

Hi,Peripheral neuropathy is nerve damage which can occur either as a result of nutritional deficiency like B12 deficiency or due to diabetes. Trauma to the nerves can also cause neuropathy. Your symptoms of burning sensation can be due to peripheral neuropathy. How ever it is also important to rule out causes like thyroid dysfunction.Hope this helps!
